General.Name: Kamat Hotels (I) Limited
General.Description: Kamat Hotels (India) Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the hospitality business in India. It operates hotels and resorts under the brands The Orchid, Fort Jadhavgadh, Lotus Konark, and Mahodadhi Palace. The company also operates restaurants; and provides hotel consultancy, setups, and other related services. Kamat Hotels (India) Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Mumbai, India.

3.Name: Mr. Vishal V. Kamat
3.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Fort Jadhavgadh - Pune
